# Preface {-}

https://omicsview.org

[![FigureS0](https://interactivereport.github.io/OmicsView/tutorial/figures/FigureS0.jpg)](https://interactivereport.github.io/OmicsView/tutorial/figures/FigureS0.jpg)

From the login page, users can use their email to register an account (recommended), as this enables users to save results and upload their own data. Otherwise, a guest account can be used to view public data.
